thread.title: Condo Sales Stall at Trump Tower

author: Josh Barbanel
title: Condo Sales Stall at Trump Tower

organizations.name: berkshire hathaway home services new york properties

text:
At Trump Tower, the Presidentâ€™s flagship Fifth Avenue residence and corporate headquarters, condominium sales have slowed sharply since last fall amid a broader slump in Manhattan transactions.
The building has logged just one sale this year and two since last September, both one-bedroom apartments on lower floors that sold for less than other recent sales of similar units in the tower. Larger, more expensive listings have been lingering.
